sections.description: Shiprocket WooCommerce Integration provides real-time shipping rates and pincode serviceability check for your WooCommerce store using the official Shiprocket API.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.6

  • Added WordPress native update checker for automatic plugin updates
  • Enhanced GitHub Actions automation for seamless releases
  • Complete integration with WordPress update system
  • Automatic update notifications in WordPress admin
  • Comprehensive update information with rich changelogs
  • Automatic version synchronization between GitHub and WordPress

Version 1.0.5

  • Enhanced plugin functionality and performance improvements
  • Updated to latest Shiprocket API standards
  • Improved error handling and user experience
  • Better caching mechanism for optimal performance

Previous Versions

  • See full changelog on GitHub releases page

upgrade_notice: Important update: Version 1.0.6 introduces WordPress native update checker for automatic plugin updates. Enhanced GitHub Actions automation for seamless releases.
